ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Good question.. I dunno. My druid uses a wraithbone hammer. luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
Good question.. I dunno. My druid uses a wraithbone hammer.
luv,
-Su

> What level do you need to be at for these?
> I am a Druid with a Velium Hammer and it tells me I
> have not enough wisdom for this weapon.
>
> Any ideas?
>
> Rob
> --- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> >
> > You can use items with charges. or that proc spells
> > or something. Like
> > velium weapons which proc velium shards.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > > how can i get magic if im not a wizard or anything
> > that can use magic
> >
> >
> >
